website_summaries.verdict: Liquid formula works better for some dogs than tablets or chewables. Product reduces joint pain and improves mobility.
pros: Owners say adding this liquid to the dog's food provides good results
Product provides noticeable pain relief within a few days
Picky eaters even seem to like the taste of the liquid formula
cons: Price is a little higher than some chewable options
Liquid has an orange or red color that may stain fur

customer_reviews.title: The best that I have purchased yet!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my 11 year old cat. She waddles like a raccoon she is so large and stoked up with arthritis. I fed her this in her food and within 3 days I started seeing a difference in how she walked and she started coming out into the living room and socializing with the family. She is a totally different cat. She seems to be more content and was even playful a few nights. I will keep her on this for the rest of her days because I love her and am happy to see a side of her that I haven't seen in a few years. Thanks for the great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Dillon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saved my yorkie from surgery!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old yorkie was diagnosed with a level 1 luxating patella in both her hind legs. Dozens of times a day her knees would pop out of socket. I started this supplement on June 22nd. I decided to wait a month before writing my review and boy am I glad I did because this stuff is AMAZING. In just one short month the improvement I've seen in miraculous. Her knees have been fine, they haven't popped out once and she has so much more mobility, energy & ability. We have changed absolutely nothing in her lifestyle or diet besides this supplement so I'm 100% sure it is attributed to it. I highly recommend this, will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Creaky, old catmudgeon has started running around!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a chonky, old rescue cat for about a year and a half, who creaked around painfully until I'd been adding this stuff to his food for a month. I think I saw improvement at two weeks, but I didn't want to read too much into things...the last couple days though, I've seen him run and jump and and be obviously more comfortable moving around. This is huge!! It has me considering comparable supplements for myself. Side note, I wouldn't call him a super finicky eater, but he has his preferences, and he didn't hesitate to eat his food with this mixed in.
customer_reviews.author: DeepGreenThumbs

customer_reviews.title: My old dog moves more  freely
customer_reviews.text: My oldest dog - almost 13 - has the usual stiffness and irritability that comes from chronic pain. He moves much more freely on this product. He is less grumpy and every once in a while he even trots about! I have another dog with an inoperable fracture in her growth plate and I give this to her as a preventative for the arthritic pain that she is sure to develop. The both love it. The cost is more than reasonable as it lasts quite a while and squirting it on their dinner is easy for me as well. I highly recommend this over any of the others that I have tried over the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Zoedak

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that dog owners start with a low dosage and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to prevent any joint and hip problems that Newfoundland dogs are susceptible to. My 11-month-old Newf loves the bacon flavor of this product and tolerates it well. I recommend that dog owners start with a low dosage and increase it gradually until the recommended dosage has been reached. This will prevent any intestinal discomfort or diarrhea dogs can experience. The pump feature on the bottle makes using this supplement very convenient. Because of the quality ingredients utilized in this product, I am confident that my dog will have a long and comfortable life. The customer service at Pure Paw Nutrition is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Lover

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepard, who has signs of Dysplasia even as a young dog. She's coming up on 7 now and before I started giving it, she was not much interested in playing with the 1 year old pup..but after a couple of weeks, she seems to have more pep in her step and I see her chasing and playing more. She doesn't seem crazy about the taste, so it's not enough to get her eating but if I can get her to eat, she seems to have more fun.
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have a black lab whose 7 years old and has arthritis in her spine. This supplement has changed her so much, she runs around like a puppy again, has so much more energy and I'm loving seeing her run and play with her doggy friends again. The bottle is huge, I've had it for 6 weeks and I've still got quite a bit left. I've tried several supplements and this is the one that's helped the most. And the bacon flavor is a huge benefit for my dog. ;) She loves her bacon. I have never seen a supplement help my dog so much. I am a fan of this for life. :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Now that I've been using this for over a month...
customer_reviews.text: I see a difference in my fox terrier. He had a real hard time getting up in the morning, but I see a definite difference. He still has his days, but not nearly as bad as before starting this. It does, however, make my other dog sick, he's vomited twice since I started him on it and he never gets sick from anything. So I've taken him off. They do both love the flavor though--bacon, who wouldn't?
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for awhile. Our dog was having trouble with his back legs and was limping quite badly. Since using the product he is not limping and is able to jump down from things and run again like a puppy. One of the best things is that he seems to love the taste and eats his food with no problem. Before using the glucosamine he was picky with his food and sometimes didn't eat at all so we actually an added benefit of his eating his dinner every night. I am really impressed by this product and will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: patsea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving this to my two senior cats, Lilly (16) and Bob C (13), and my younger cat, Hotei (4), for about a week now. Hotei has occasional hip pain and Lilly has arthritis that has been slowly immobilizing her back end the last few years. I've tried giving them Cosequin before but really didn't see the results, probably in part to them not liking the powder on their food. After a week of giving them this formula I already see all three of my babies being more active, and my poor little Lilly is noticeably less stiff! I'm very happy with it so far. Will update after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Kara

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Really like the pump style to add to their food easily, and not having to refrigerate it is great because I can leave it with the food canister, so I don't forget to use it. Those are the positive points for me, as far as the dogs go, they seem to like the flavor, and I give it to a 6, 7, and 10 year old. They didn't really have any major issues with movement or health before, I just thought it would be good supplement to their diet, just like We supplement our own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever did!
customer_reviews.text: I love this supplement! I give it to my 2 older miniature dachshunds. They are running around like puppies since I started adding this to their food. Previously, they were having a hard time moving around. Sassy is 17 years old and Dyna is 15. I'm so glad I found this product after web searching for weeks. Amazon offered a big discount if I purchased the glucosamine and Salmon oil together. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Opinion

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Started giving this for my chihuahua and toy poodle who both have leg issues. Has done very well for them and they like the taste of tuna. It is very easy to put into their food, no more measuring each morning when I feed them breakfast. The chihuahua has hip dysplasia and it has done wonders for her. I have been trying different supplements in a period of 5 yrs, from tablets to liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong bacon smell
customer_reviews.text: I think this product helps my senior dog. It’s hard to say for sure because I have him on many many supplements. Only thing I dislike about this product is the strong bacon smell. I would not buy this product again because of that. I am planning on finishing the bottle that I have already purchased. I just give smaller than suggested amounts to decrease the strong artificial odor. Btw. My dog could care less about the odor. He eats anything. It’s more of a preference/tolerance for myself.
customer_reviews.author: kuma

customer_reviews.title: LEO APPROVED!
customer_reviews.text: My fur child is a 75 lb Rhodesian Ridgeback mix, he's now 12 years old so arthritis has slowed him down a bit. He really loves this stuff on his food (almost eats it TOO FAST!) and his mobility is good. I would say great but he's 12 years old = 84 in human years - good is AWESOME at 84 yrs old! I would definitely recommend this to everybody, don't wait until the signs of slowing down and pain start. Be proactive and keep them moving better for even longer :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheri ~ L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to clinically assess this product but it seems to help my 13 year old dog. He has been hesitant to jump up into chairs and stuff like that but it appears that those things are easier now and he has been on the stuff about 6 weeks. He is more playful and runs around more. I think it is a good value for the price. He is also a VERY picky eater and he gobbles up his food with it on there so he must like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Really easy and she likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My girl seems to be happier and more active. She doesn't show the stiffness that she had before. Definitely more affordable than other brands and she likes the bacon flavor. I had chewable supplements that I had purchased but she wouldn't touch it. I put this in her food in the am and she gobbles it right down.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Does make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Our Pit was waking up limping every morning. Vet couldn't find anything wrong so she said it had to be a little arthritis in there. So we took it upon ourselves to put her on this. I give her 3 full squirts on top of her food every day and mix it up. She has stopped limping and loves the taste..... Win win...
customer_reviews.author: Ranee Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the health of you fur babies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I bought the largest bottle available, for the stretch in my case it goes fairly fast. But my between my 2 dogs, your looking at about 200lbs. They love the flavor, eat it right down (mixed in their food). Especially that one is very picky! I would recommend this product, and it's a good value f9r the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and grateful for the positive results.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the results my 14 year old overweight cat is experiencing! After a few weeks on this stuff, my cat is now jumping on chairs clibing to the second level of the cat tree and playing! She hasn't done jumping or climbing in years! I am so happy! I was sceptical because I have tried several other well known products that had no effect so I am grateful this product has given my beloved cat new life.
customer_reviews.author: Lytepipe

customer_reviews.title: I have an elderly cat and dog both suffering from advanced cases of arthritis because they're pretty old. My cat is running around more like ...
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be skeptical about such products, but it works as advertised. I have an elderly cat and dog both suffering from advanced cases of arthritis because they're pretty old. My cat is running around more like he was a few years ago and is more of a brat like he usually was and my dog is walking around less like a rickety old man. The only thing is my cat's a picky eater and he tends to try to lap up the supplement over eating his food. I'll be getting more when this bottle is out.
customer_reviews.author: James Takenaga

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but i think its a little expensive.... As an update i really had notice improvement in my 11 year old pit, more than anything i notice pain has reduced as she tends to walk more. I was desperate to find a product that will help her with the pain caused by age and eventhough its expensive It's worth to see my girl feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: The supplement seems to be helping our White German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: The supplement seems to be helping our White German Shepherd, all notorious for the ACL tendon. She had surgery on one side and injured the other side and with the help of your supplement, she is improving immensely. From limping terribly, and crying out in pain, these days she is happy and smiling, running even at times, with our other pup. She is a picky eater, however, she enjoys the flavor of your supplement, licks her chops when she sees the bottle coming and laps it up happily. We are truly grateful for such an awesome product! Thanks kindly to your research scientists for such a healing product for our Queen! Sincerely, Jim and Pia McDonald
customer_reviews.author: JimmyLee

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for my cat with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I stopped giving this to my cat who suffers from arthritis. It hasn't helped. I also realized since cats can develop bladder or kidney stones, it is not a good idea to give them the extra vitamin C. I'm searching for just Glucosamine and Chondroitin to give my cat without the extra supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. We have bought this as well as the salmon oil and our dog loves both. We were having a hard time getting him to eat after some changes in the home, and this stuff really helped get his appetite back. On top of that, our boy tore his ACL when he was a year old and he is now going on 7 and feeling the effects of that. With this glucosamine supplement, we've been able to take him off of his pain pills and he runs and plays just like a puppy again, it's been amazing. We are really grateful for this product. An we always receive a friendly email from the company with each order.
customer_reviews.author: CLo

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My boxer was experiencing discomfort with exercise in her back legs. After 6 weeks of taking the I noticed a decided change. She now runs and plays without any discomfort. I strongly feel this supplement has helped her immensely and I’ll now give it to both my dogs as a preventative for possible future joint problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Loiacono

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry you tried it for your animal
customer_reviews.text: My boy has elbow dysplasia and had surgery on both his elbows when he was 1 year old. Ever since going to the beach or on very long walks he would start limping. He is 8 years old now. The beginning of the summer we went to the beach, he played and swam. He came home limping for days. I found this product and after taking it for 4 weeks, twice a day, I noticed a huge change. He has not limped once since starting this product. I’m so happy I found it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Libertynj1

customer_reviews.title: Two pumps to a better Health
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old Black Labrador recently had a TPLO surgery. Our Vet recommend that we give him Glucosamine supplements. I have always believe that a liquid version of Glucosamine would be better than a pill. I am giving my Lab this glucosamine as a preventative for his joints and the added MSM, Chondroitin and CoQ10 is a bonus. There is so much write up on the health benefits of the added MSM, Chondroitin and CoQ10 you can't help but give your pet this supplement. My Lab loves the Bacon flavor as now I do need to add canned food to entice him to eat his kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Renoc

customer_reviews.title: A blessing for my cat with hip dysplasia
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old cat developed hip dysplasia and was limping badly. She could not jump up to even low places and would instead pull herself up using mainly her front legs. After about a month on this product she was moving much more freely and eventually got to the point that she was running and jumping again. Very satisfied with the product and have re-ordered several times.
customer_reviews.author: S. McConnell

customer_reviews.title: She likes getting around better
customer_reviews.text: I have to hide this in my cat's milk. But once she drinks it, I can tell she feels better. She is back to jumping up on the bed herself and walking easier. I even bought a bottle for my sister in law whose cats is older than mine and having joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: WTF!!!
customer_reviews.text: My fat cat with arthritis is 17years old and since started using this is now running up and down the stairs and jumping on our bed!!!!! She hasn’t been able to run and jump in 4 years!!! I didn’t think anything would make her feel this good I’m shocked....
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: She eats it & Human Grade
customer_reviews.text: We have tried chews, tabs, etc and my dog never has liked to eat them. Now we squirt this on her food and she gobbles it down. I like that it is human grade, so it makes me feel better about feeding it to her.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great for joints and limping
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving this to my 13 year old yorkie for his joints, he was limping alot at night or after laying down for long periods of time. I have noticed a huge improvement he no longer limps upon getting up. 100% worth it. He has has no reaction to this either. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved it and bought this for years but something happened or got a bad batch or something because now if I put it in their food they won't eat it and if they do eat it they get sick. Disappointed as I've had great results prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to protect my old dog. I add one start every other day to morning meal. Too much gives him diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Blackstar5

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs, but my dispenser hack is a must!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to really respond well to this and the salmon oil plus a CBD oils I give them. I have two American staffys and a GSD, BUT the dispensers are kind of gross, leaving drips and goop when I use the pump and droplets if I use the cap. I came up with the best idea EVER!!!! I bought “AOZITA” mouthwash dispensers here on Amazon to put the liquids in! They dispense like a liquor bottle at a bar. It’s amazing!!! No more mess!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Glucosamine
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old Australian shepherd/blue heeler was having trouble with her hips. After giving her this supplement she was able to get up a little easier and get around a little better. The liquid is easy to apply to her food. She didn't seem to even notice that it was on her food.
customer_reviews.author: Billzer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it gets better
customer_reviews.text: I will update my review as things progress but so far things aren’t so good. The product came with a broken lid and the liquid leaked all over the place. It definitely smells like bacon!! Once I got the bottle cleaned up and the pump on, it was fine. We’ve tried giving it to our 12 year old mutt a couple times but he doesn’t seem to like it. We will continue trying different ways to get him to consume it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Gore

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Our large breed dog showed significant improvement after being on this. She went from limping to jumping around. We’ve added it to her food for probably the past four years now. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps so Much!
customer_reviews.text: My Dog has been on the best Paw Nutrition for 3 months and is able to go up and down stairs again. It has made our special fur friend of 12 1/2 able to get around and go with us to our vacation home and enjoy going in the lake. We are very happy with the product and our dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Twomey-Roux

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped my senior dogs that have knee issues. Our smallest 10 year old chihuahua was holding her knee up and not putting any weight on it quite a bit and once we started giving her this every morning she hasn't had any issues at all. She's running around and playing more than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Maria3053

customer_reviews.title: seems to work after 6 weeks use
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a definte improvement in my 12 year old cat's mobility after 6 weeks use...will probably go with a different flavor next time as apparently my cats are not connoisseurs of bacon
customer_reviews.author: Cat Stevens

customer_reviews.title: My Peke is Having Fun Again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle, I am dosing a peke that was snapping at his back legs, chewing and licking his back legs would cry out. Now no more crying, licking or snapping, my dog is 14 years of age and peke's have a lot of back problems because of their length. I have a much happier dog today, after his meals he takes little naps and is his use to be bouncy self. So very thankful I found this, will highly recommend it to other pet owners no reluctance at feed time, relishes the taste.
customer_reviews.author: stlmagnolia

customer_reviews.title: By golley, it really works!
customer_reviews.text: I raise German Shepherds and train them in agility and tracking. I've used OsteoBiflex with success for years as a preventative supplement to protect their joints. However, when one of my furry kids gets injured or stoved up a little I have nothing that gives them real relief as well as protection. I ordered Dog dream just for a trial. In cold rainy weather when even my bones ached, I saw the added relief in my furry kids that I had hoped for. We'll be sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this! I’m a dog sitter and one of my clients got this for his dog that was older so when my dachshund hurt her back I thought now is the perfect time!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Shiny coat, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I started using this with my 9 week old puppy. She loves the taste of it, and I can tell by her coat (so soft and shiny) that it’s working! It’s super easy to give and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Cepa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works and my dog loves it. It's very expensive considering the size of my dog, but he is much happier when he has it so I keep it on hand and combine it with the Alaskan Salmon Oil daily. It has done wonders for his energy and allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff !!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was showing signs of stiffness and soreness. This definitely helped her feel better. This is my second bottle. It may seem expensive but it lasts a month. My dog is 80lbs. I’m so glad this helped !!!

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this and seem much more mobile
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seem to love it and are 7.5 and 7 and now running up and down the stairs and playing more together in the back yard! Like that it's in liquid not pill form

customer_reviews.title: This works

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: GS PUPPY with full coat. Been using the product for about a month. Coat is GORGEOUS with sheen. I also noticed she had been scratching before. Since we started the product her scratching is minimal and normal. Loved this product, just bought my second bottle to ensure she doesn't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Stella S

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My 11 shih tzu seems to be spunkier after taking this supplement. She is still able to jump up on couches and has even been able to go on longer walks. I recommend this product to animal lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT GREAT product and service!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has made a HUGE difference with the healing of my dogs ACL tear! I can not recommend this enough!! Plus, it's made in the USA. I am so glad I found this product and Venice has been very helpful and kind. I will not be without this supplement for my dog. I have already told so many about this : )

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty much like the oil can is to the tin ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7yr old pitbull that is my life. I noticed she was having a little trouble coming up the stairs and jumping in the car. Shes 80lbs and I add two pumps to each meal. It’s pretty much like the oil can is to the tin man in the wizard of oz. It works that good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pomeleo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Brought much needed relief to my 13 year old Maine Coon’s rear legs joint pain. Much happier cat because of it. I shared the product with my daughter for her cattle dog’s back pain. Worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: libertybelle

customer_reviews.title: Wooooow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This so the best purchase I have ever made. My cat has bad arthritis and after his first does he is walking about 50% better. I can’t believe it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to squirt into the dog's food twice a day. She has more spring in her step after taking this for a few weeks, and she loves the bacon flavor. Pure Paw has gone overboard in responding to my comments and addressing my concerns. It's so rare to find a company that takes this much interest in their customers!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie HananTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.text: My dogs hated it, they rather not eat than eat their food with this on their food. it had a really bad smell too.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will not touch this when it's on their food so I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: He's still not sure about the taste, but...
customer_reviews.text: it is definitely helping. And, it beats having to shove the pill form down his throat.

customer_reviews.text: I have tried other oils for my 14-year old Dalmatian/Labrador mix, but this product is the best thus far. Annabelle thinks she's a young puppy and her arthritis is almost non-existent. I highly recommend this oil!

customer_reviews.title: Made dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Made one of my dogs throw up a couple of times so had to stop using. He’s 65 pounds and only got a couple pumps with dinner, but made him ill. Sucks.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a liquid disperse squeezer
customer_reviews.text: Should have mouth disperse squeezer for administering to pet. I had to add to drinking water until I bought a Tylenol liquid squeezer to do direct mouth dose.

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: this really works!!! within a weeks time i noticed my Rottweilers limp is not as severe and her pain is gone that makes me really happy that I finally found something she likes that's not in a pill i can add to her food daily. She is much better :)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Organic

customer_reviews.title: Safe for dogs with sensitive stomach and can't tolerate any other meds
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help our 13 year old pitbull with her arthritis. After trying other options from prescription from veterinarian & herbal treatments this works best for her.

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for all 4 of my cats but only 1 likes it. Loves it, in fact! He gets 1 squirt a day over his kibble.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Senior Boxer Owner
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Boxer, Dixie, loves this on her meals. I’m happy because she’s not limping as much since I began giving it to her a month ago. I will update after the 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Beard

customer_reviews.title: Bear walk better. It's hard to tell
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be helping Mr. Bear walk better. It's hard to tell. I give a squirt morning and evening with meals. Mr. Bear is 15. If he didn't sleep all day, I could show you.

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the cat liking the flavor, and it seems to have brought him a lot of pain relief

customer_reviews.title: It just did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 13 has arthritis and I gave it to her 2 times a day as it states but all this time and I do not see a change at all. I was really hoping but no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Keesadie

customer_reviews.title: Great for older Pet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a returning customer for this product. My 15.5 yr, old kitty seems to have little or no problems getting around or jumping when needed. Very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis symptoms improved
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my dog's limp (due to arthritis) is noticibly improved & now he can jump up on the bed! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: BEST supplement for arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I notice a HUGE difference in my pit mix. He has arthritis and doesn't move well. Within a few days, he's jumping off the couch and out running me on walks. I'll definitely be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: jennifer moore

customer_reviews.title: No more limping,  more energy.....GREAT STUFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a female mini schnauzer (13 1/2) & a male boston terrier (61/2) . This is the best product I have found for their arthritis & overall health in general. I will continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MTRoadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Lab loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for our 13 year old yellow lab. Her back legs have been giving out on her and we are trying to give her as much support as possible. She loves the flavor and licks every last drop.
customer_reviews.author: teresa lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value to protect pet joints.
customer_reviews.text: Buster seems to like the bacon flavor so reordered and started second bottle. He seems to not have any joint pain! I also feed him a couple tablespoons of canned salmon daily.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coastie

customer_reviews.title: Zoe feels great on Glucosamine Chondroitin for Dogs and Cats!!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps Zoe up and moving much like a younger dog. She is 16 years old and looking forward to many more years of mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy

customer_reviews.title: Love the larger bottle with the pump
customer_reviews.text: My almost 14 year old Labrador seems to be getting up and down easier which is a big plus
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Beenau

customer_reviews.title: they love it! The biggest difference I've seen is with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 dogs which I give this all to, they love it! The biggest difference I've seen is with our oldest, our 13 year old golden. She is very healthy, but like all large dogs at that age, she was really struggling to get around. I found this product and decided to try it. After about 3 days of using this, she got up and brought me a ball!! It has made a huge difference for her and I know it is helping the others too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Liquid glucosamine BACON FLAVORED
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my old fur babies. They love the taste, they literally lick their bowls clean! Seems to keep their joints lubed up enough to feel comfortable and no more limping from my 13 yo Aussie!
customer_reviews.author: MelMarie80

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my weenie dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a month and have noticed my two weeine dogs having more energy and moving easily. One of my dogs was diagnosed with IVDD. She seems to be alot better. She's playing like her old self again. It's nice to see this. They both look forward to eating now. They both will be on this for the rest of their years. Love it, and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Blou

customer_reviews.title: Bad pump
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well it works but the pump is terrible. Leaks a lot with every use and smells terribly. Dog won’t eat by itself but will over food.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Saw an amazing difference in my 11 almost 12 year dog with ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw an amazing difference in my 11 almost 12 year dog with generalized arthritis as well as a couple of previous orthopedic injuries. Old dogs like old people heal slower and this product definitely helps my old dog move more freely with moments of younger dog activity. Thank you for this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kamie

customer_reviews.title: The cats like it
customer_reviews.text: I feel good knowing my cats are getting these supplements to keep them healthy.
customer_reviews.author: dreamy12

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had more mobility and energy since using this product. Squirt on her food and she loves the bacon flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Riggenbach

customer_reviews.title: Pure paw glucosamine great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dog for the last 6 months would not jump up on my bed and he always did before after 6 weeks he is jumping up on the bed again has more pep than before I started using this great product
customer_reviews.author: arthur brown

customer_reviews.title: Not junk
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and it shows on her running and healing
customer_reviews.author: E.L.H

customer_reviews.title: This is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: First, I can't tell you what this tastes like but the chillins love it. Hyper pleased with the speed in which our orbder was filled. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: My dog is so much better
customer_reviews.text: My dog buddy was having a lot of trouble getting around because of his Advanced age I wanted to try your product to hopefully it would get him better and surprisingly it has he has improved a lot since I first got your product and I want to thank you for giving me a chance to try your premium product
customer_reviews.author: Michael ellenburg

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second bottle of this for 3 German Shepherds and it seems to be helping, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nadja

customer_reviews.title: Dog Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like the flavor and it only takes two squirts fo a 95 lb dog
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Yes/No
customer_reviews.text: My dog really doesn't care for the taste. But he does seem like he has been getting around better. The price could be just a little bit cheaper. But over all. Its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Dooty

customer_reviews.title: I saw improvement in her mobility but the product caused ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw improvement in her mobility but the product caused her stomach (which is sensitive to begin with.) to be upset daily.
customer_reviews.author: gwen williams

customer_reviews.title: very good support from seller
customer_reviews.text: product seems good - Dogs like it. Customer service is 5 star
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for your best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 year old yellow lab. He takes it over his dog food. He has no digestive issues. And he moved much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ohalek

customer_reviews.title: Quality Oil
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality oil. Smells clean. Quality bottle and pump. It's only been a few days, but my old girl LOVES it and I'm hoping it helps her feel like a spring chicken again.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three paws up
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs love this stuff. Been ordering this for a while now. They don’t mind the flavor if they are licking it all up!
customer_reviews.author: Stamparoo

customer_reviews.title: A spring in her step!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of dispensing, my 14 year old girl has more spring in her step, overall happier in general. Will keep purchasing more. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of product that is all good for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: LBassy

customer_reviews.title: but she's does love the product and I figure it's working within
customer_reviews.text: I have a twelve-year-old boxer who, since I've added a squirt to her dry food, will not eat with out it. Can't say I've noticed any particular fountain of youth expectations, but she's does love the product and I figure it's working within.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Woods

product_meta.title: Best Paw Nutrition - Bacon Flavor Liquid Glucosamine for Dogs & Cats - Chondroitin, MSM, Hyaluronic Acid - Dog Arthritis Home Remedy - Joint Supplement for Hip & Joint Pain Relief Pets Love
feature_bullets: HIPS & JOINTS PAIN RELIEF - Arthritis, hip dysplasia and wear on cartilage and tendons can cause discomfort. Specially formulated for pets that suffer from stiffness, limping or difficulty climbing stairs.

FEEL LIKE A PUPPY OR KITTEN - A proprietary blend of anti-aging vitamins and minerals. This formula provides health benefits that turn back the clock of time. Your senior dog or cat can feel happy, healthy and young again.

NATURAL BACON FLAVOR - 32oz for medium to large breeds. An arthritis supplement that your canine or feline will drool for. Simple to pump over food, mix and serve! Picky eaters love the taste and will beg for it on their food.

PET MOBILITY MIRACLE - Provides advanced immune support to help keep the body strong and moving pain-free. A complete, maximum strength anti-inflammatory and pain reliever. Helps extend mobility and rejuvenate your pet's joints.

VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED - Vets recommend trying Dog & Cat Dream Glucosamine before medication. Safe, natural and no-side effects make it a veterinarian's top choice. Try this right away if you're looking for a home remedy alternative to medicine.
